name: Mememory
description:
This is a memory game. In which there are some cards face down, where you have to find the ones that are the same. When you find a matching pair, you have to play against the rock-paper-scissors machine.  If you match, the cards will remain face up, otherwise they will not. The game ends when all cards are face up.

Note: Play Full Screen.

Drive: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1vYY2RFmzYf31P_zma2afRaBZU3bYWPNR

GitHub: https://github.com/1treu1/3a-Jam
